doc:
Tommy Noonan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tommy_Noonan 0 Tommy Noonan (April 29, 1921 – April 24, 1968) was a comedy genre film performer, screenwriter and producer. He acted in a number of 'A' and 'B' pictures from the 1940s through the 1960s, and he is best known for his supporting performances as Gus Esmond, wealthy fiancé of Lorelei Lee (Marilyn Monroe) in Gentlemen Prefer Blondes (1953), and as the musician Danny McGuire in A Star Is Born (1954). He played a stock room worker in the film Bundle of Joy (1956) with Eddie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds. Tommy_Noonan ( April_29_,_1921 – April_24 , 1968 ) was a_comedy_genre_film_performer , screenwriter_and_producer . He acted in a_number of ' A_'_and_'_B_'_pictures from the_1940s through the_1960s , and he is_best_known for his_supporting_performances as Gus_Esmond , wealthy_fiancé of Lorelei_Lee_(_Marilyn_Monroe_) in Gentlemen_Prefer_Blondes_(_1953_) , and as the_musician_Danny_McGuire in A_Star Is_Born (_1954_) . He played a_stock_room_worker in the_film_Bundle of Joy_(_1956_) with Eddie_Fisher and Debbie_Reynolds .
